title.for_your_business: For your business and personal brand
title.advertising_agency: We provide premium services <br \/>In the field of Digital Marketing <br \/>It’s a pleasure to work with us <br \/>And earn money

about.name: About us
about.desc: We are a full-service marketing agency. Our team combines strategy, creativity, and analytics to help your business grow faster than the competition. We understand the market and speak the language of numbers, not promises.

about_1.name: In the digital industry
about_1.desc: This is our foundation. We have walked the path with the market, from the first SMM experiments to advanced analytics and automation. Now this experience works for you.

about_2.name: Completed projects in 5 countries
about_2.desc: Over this time, we have accumulated practical experience working in various niches and with companies of all sizes—from local startups to international brands.

about_3.name: Customer Satisfaction Index
about_3.desc: This indicator is the result of an individual approach and complete immersion in each project
about_3.notice: * according to research conducted by Oyster Computer on November 24, 2023

case_3.name: CETUS
case_3.desc: Conducting a marketing campaign with onboarding elements

service.name: Services
service.desc: A complete list of marketing tools and practices to scaling your business and promoting a personal brand

service_1.name: Online Promotion
service_1.desc: Social media, lead generation, (PPC, targeted ads), online reputation management (ORM), PR, email marketing, and other tools

service_2.name: Full-Cycle Development
service_2.desc: Websites, mobile apps, CRM systems, Telegram bots, web design, presentations

service_3.name: Original Content Creation
service_3.desc: Thematic copywriting, photo/video content, AI-generated content

service_4.name: Digital Consulting
service_4.desc: Marketing strategy, process automation, employee training

service_5.name: SEO
service_5.desc: Promote your website in Yandex and Google search results

service_6.name: Telegram Ads
service_6.desc: Promote your channel. Run ads in Telegram Ads or on major popular channels.

service_7.name: SERM
service_7.desc: Manage your business's online reputation. We'll post positive reviews about you on 100+ platforms.

service_8.name: Marketplace
service_8.desc: Promote your store on major marketplaces. Avito / Ozon / Wildberries.

service_9.name: Crypto Marketing
service_9.desc: Generate interest in your project among the most engaged and solvent audience in the crypto community.

service_10.name: Influencers
service_10.desc: Order advertising for your business from popular bloggers and influencers. Invite them to shoot your content.

service_11.name: PR
service_11.desc: Increase brand awareness through media. Get featured in major online publications.

service_12.name: Content
service_12.desc: Order media content creation for your website and social media. Reels / Videos / Memes.

service_13.name: Newsletters
service_13.desc: Launch an email/SMS/Telegram newsletter to inform potential clients of important news.

service_14.name: Facebook
service_14.desc: Has your advertising account been blocked or isn't working? We'll solve problems with the FB ecosystem. Pay-per-results.

service_15.name: Websites
service_15.desc: Order website or landing page development of any complexity.

service_16.name: Mobile Apps
service_16.desc: Expand your business ecosystem with a mobile app for iOS/Android.

service_17.name: Telegram Bots
service_17.desc: Use Telegram functionality to optimize your business processes. Order creation A bot for any purpose

service_18.name: Design
service_18.desc: A full range of web design services for your business: from logo creation to branding of products and services

service_19.name: Presentations
service_19.desc: Order a professional presentation of your business/products/services

team_1.title: Join the team
team_1.desc: Our digital marketing expertise allows us to make quick decisions and deliver meaningful results. We have open vacancies. Leave a request with your contact details to find out more.

team_2.title: Join the team
team_2.name: Opportunity
team_2.desc: A candidate's appearance, age, location, or views don't matter to us. What's important is talent, a strong work ethic, a desire to grow, and the ability to always stay connected.

team_3.title: Join the team
team_3.name: Growth and Training
team_3.desc: A lack of knowledge or experience in a particular field is not an obstacle, but an incentive to master a new area. We provide training based on real case studies and help you develop your skills.

team_4.title: Join the team
team_4.name: Great Compensation
team_4.desc: We will cover the cost of any tools, services, and neural networks for a comfortable workflow, provide an above-market salary, and offer numerous bonus opportunities. We respect your work, which is why we even pay for test assignments.

frame_1.name: Highly Recommended
frame_1.desc: We work with both large enterprises and startups.

frame_2.name: Comprehensive Approach
frame_2.desc: From strategy and branding to lead generation and analytics — we cover the full digital marketing cycle.

frame_3.name: Maximum Involvement
frame_3.desc: Complete immersion in your business niche for maximum effectiveness.

frame_4.name: Tailored Solutions
frame_4.desc: Every project is unique. We avoid cookie-cutter solutions and develop a strategy that works specifically for your business.

feedback.title2: All we need is your number
feedback.desc: Fill out the form and your personal assistant will contact you
